segments.text: Do you have any idea what time it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My bad . I didn't realize that it was so late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you really think that that excuses your tardiness ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . I really did lose track of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't I tell you to call when you're running late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you did . I just forgot to call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter , you should have called and let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . My bad for not calling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you do this again , don't even bother coming home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to kick me out over this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , maybe that'll teach you to respect my rules .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if I'm not living here anymore , then I won't have to listen to your rules .
segments.speaker: S2
